hero.bio: Transforming data into actionable insights and building ML solutions that drive business impact.

about.title: About Me
about.text1: I'm a Data Scientist with expertise in building machine learning models and extracting actionable insights from complex datasets. My work focuses on creating data-driven solutions that deliver measurable business value.
about.text2: With a strong foundation in statistics, programming, and cloud technologies, I transform raw data into strategic assets that drive informed decision-making.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.text: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, collaborations, or data science challenges.

footer.built: Built with Python, Flask, HTML, CSS, JavaScript and deployed on Render.
